config.markdown:
## MANUAL STEP NOTICE: This app is used with Early Access Feature Management and needs to inject code into your website through posthog-js. You need to **opt-in** on your site to enable this behaviour.

```
posthog.init("api_key", {
  "api_host": "https://app.posthog.com",
  "opt_in_site_apps": true,
})
```

config.name: Selector
config.hint: CSS selector to activate on. For example: "#my-beta-button" or "[data-attr='posthog-early-access-features-button']"

config.name: Show features button on the page
config.hint: If enabled, a button will be shown on the page that will open the features modal.
